model

Class ReactiveRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ReactiveRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PCExpression

    public class ReactiveRule
extends Object
implements PCExpression
    This class represents the reactive rules of a LPS framework.
    Author:
    Alexandre Camus

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReactiveRule

        public ReactiveRule(Goal conditions,
            SimpleSentence goal)
        Constructor of the class.
        Parameters:
        conditions - the conditions of the reactive rule. This is the left part of the implication.
        goal - the goal to fire if the conditions are true. This is the right part of the implication.

    • Method Detail

      • fireRule

        public ArrayList<Unifiable> fireRule(RuleSet database)
        Fires the goals of the rule. Each goal represents a different bindings of the variables of the conditions that make it true.
        Parameters:
        database - the table of truth to which the conditions are submitted to be checked.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList object containing all the goals created.

      • replaceVariables

        public ReactiveRule replaceVariables(SubstitutionSet s)
        Replaces all the variables in the reactive rule according to the specified bindings.

        This method is recursive over all PCExpression implementations.

        Specified by:
        replaceVariables in interface PCExpression
        Parameters:
        s - the SubstitutionSet that contains the bindings of the variables so far.
        Returns:
        a ReactiveRule object representing the bound reactive rule.
        See Also:
        PCExpression.replaceVariables(model.SubstitutionSet)

      • standardizeVariablesApart

        public ReactiveRule standardizeVariablesApart(Hashtable<Variable,Variable> newVars)
        Standardizes the variables in order to be sure that there won't be any variable clashes.

        This method is recursive over all PCExpression implementations.

        Specified by:
        standardizeVariablesApart in interface PCExpression
        Parameters:
        newVars - is a parameter to save over the recursion all the variable replacements done so far.
        Returns:
        a ReactiveRule object representing the standardized reactive rule.
        See Also:
        PCExpression.standardizeVariablesApart(java.util.Hashtable)

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns the reactive rule in the form of: "(conditions) -> goal".
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        See Also:
        Object.toString()
